main.intro: Welcome to Guardian :) We are commited to make people feel safe about their credintials. We know it is hard. The applications out their are complicated and often expensive to use. That is why we came up with this password management application. Why choose Guardian? The answer is
main.your_data: All your passwords with their categories
main.please_login: Please login to your account using your email and password
main.fill_form: Fill the form below to create an account
main.recommend_2fa: We highly recommend you to turn it on. It will boost your account's security and keeps it safe from possible vulnerabilities
main.2fa_congratulations: Congratulations! Your have added extra layer of security to your account.
main.remove_mfa_question: Disabling mfa will affect the security of your data negatively! are you sure?
main.mfa_enable_confirmation: Good choice, You are about to add extra layer of security to your data ✅, Proceed?
main.deactivate_warning: We will delete any deactivated account after one month from start of deactivation. Once deleted it can't be recovered, but you can reactivate your account by logging in, in case you change your mind before it gets deleted permanently
main.forgot_password_guide_text: Please type your email address in the field below. We will send a temporary password which you can use to login. Make sure to change it afterwards

rules.long_password: Your new password must be at least 10 characters long
rules.only_url: This field only accepts a url
